title: Job-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Design Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design theory and educational field experience
context.additional_context: Case Study on the Application of Science Curriculum-Integrated Design Management Techniques

learning_goals: Learners can develop design project plans using science curriculum materials according to industry standards.
Learners can appropriately apply stakeholder analysis and communication strategies in team-based design processes at 80% or higher proficiency.
Learners can advance science experiment kit prototypes through three or more stages using design management tools (e.g., Design Thinking Canvas, project timelines).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
